description:
Machine Learning Engineer:

We are seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to join a very well-funded (Series D) autonomous vehicle startup based in Mountain View, CA. Our mission is to reimagine the idea that people have of the autonomous vehicle industry today by creating a positive real-world impact.

Within this role, you will be working alongside our highly innovative team to tackle one of the hardest technology challenges: not just solving the challenging problems of developing a state-of-the-art autonomous solution but further scaling our technology to be accessible to all drivers on the road.

As an Machine Learning Engineer, you will play an integral role in the development & testing of our autonomous solutions to create our vehicles. We are looking for an engineer who has industry experience building neural networks from scratch.

What we can offer a Machine Learning Engineer:
• A highly competitive salary + equity + benefits
• The opportunity to work on a complex and groundbreaking vision
• Medical, Vision, and Dental coverage
• 401K Plan

Key Skills: Model Engineer, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Engineering, Deep Learning Frameworks, Debug, Optimize, Autonomous Vehicles, Functional Programming, Neural Networks, CNNs, DNNs, RNNs, GANs
